$interpreted: Woman: Shoo, shoo, go away. Help! Somebody help us! Anyone around?
Woman: Miss, nice timing you have there. Please go find someone to come save us!
Nolva: ......
Nolva: ... Hmmm...
Nolva: Eh, where am I? Did I fall asleep again just now?
Woman: Miss, thank you for saving us back there...
Nolva: I-I saved you two?
Nolva: Though I don't really know what's going on, I'm glad that both of you are safe.
Woman: Hmm~ Don't think I've seen you before. You're not from around here, are you?
Nolva: Yes. I'm Nolva Carpenter. I used to live in the civilian districts of Kingdom of the Sun.
Nolva: Starting today, I will be living in the village right ahead.
Woman: From the civilian districts? So you're the young girl who rented the vacant room next door? Heard you're living by yourself.
Woman: Why would you want to move to a countryside like this?
Nolva: ...My grandpa just passed away recently, so now I'm alone. Also, there has been a spree of random assaults at night in the civilian districts recently.
Nolva: I don't feel comfortable living there anymore, so I moved out.
Woman: That's scary...don't you have friends to take care of you?
Nolva: I-I don't really have friends; but no worries! I can take care of myself no problem.
Child: Sister, what is this?
Nolva: H-Hey, don't do that!
Woman: A wooden puppet?
Nolva: Yes, this is my work. The craftsmanship of these marionettes is very precise .
Nolva: My grandpa, who grew up in Atlas, taught me all of it...
Woman: Atlas!?
Nolva: Y-Yes, I am a survivor of Atlas.
Woman: O, oh, I see. That's pretty nice...excuse me, we have things to do. We'll take our leave.
Woman: ... How unlucky, that this kind of freak is our new neighbor...
Child: Mom, what's wrong?
Woman: People of Atlas have this really scary puppet religion. Rumor has it that they will craft their relatives into puppets. Super creepy...
Child: So I can't play with sister anymore?
Woman: Of course not! What if she turns you into a wooden puppet!
Nolva: Lillian, do you think that neighbor will speak ill of me to everyone in the village?
Nolva: Whatever; doesn't matter how everyone looks at me. I will be fine just by myself.
Nolva: Yawn~~ Feeling sleepy already...
Nolva: Goodnight, Lillian.
